context: Biopsies for culture were collected in sterile 20% glucose solution and placed on Trypticase soy blood agar plates (Remel, Lenexa, Kan.) and spread with the help of a sterile inoculatory loop on the same day and incubated for 7 days under microaerophilic (5% O2, 10% CO2, 85% N2) conditions. After 7 days, the plates were examined for growtH Isolated colonies were tested by light microscopy and by urease, oxidase, and catalase assays. 13C-urea breath test Approximately 1 hour after the T-EGD, the 13C-urea breath test (13C-UBT) (MERETEK diagnostics, Houston, Tex.) was performed as described previously. 5 After 2 baseline breath samples, subjects ingested a can of vanilla Ensure pudding (Ross Laboratories, Columbus, Ohio) and drank a solution of 125 mg 13C-urea in 125 mL of distilled water, then 2 breath samples were collected 30 minutes after dosing. The test was considered positive if the increase on enriched 13CO2 was 2.4 units (delta per million) 5 or greater than the baseline as measured by gas isotope ratio mass spectrometry. Acceptability Before the T-EGD, patients were asked to complete a visual analog scale of 0 to 10 regarding the overall acceptability, choking sensation, sore throat, and discomfort of conventional EGD based on their recall of the procedure. After completion of the T-EGD, the patients completed a similar visual analog scale regarding the T-EGD.
